InformativeText.Abstract:
When in a GAP Discoverable Mode for an initial connection to a Router, the Node will include the IP Support Service UUID 0x1820 in the Service UUIDs AD type field 
        of the advertising data. This enhances the user experience as a Node may be identified by the Router before initiating a connection.
InformativeText.Summary: This service does not define any characteristics

Dependencies.Dependency: This service has no dependencies on other GATT-based services.
